docs.text: BaseModelIO base_model_io Pydantic BaseModels extended with TOML and YAML loaders. TomlBaseModel Bases: BaseModel Extension of Pydantic BaseModel with TOML loader and dumper. from_toml(toml_file_path: Path) -> T classmethod Create an instance of this TomlBaseModel from a TOML file. Parameters: toml_file_path ( Path ) – the toml file path Returns: TomlBaseModel ( T ) – An instance of this TomlBaseModel to_toml(toml_file_path: Path) -> None Write this TomlBaseModel to a file. Parameters: toml_file_path ( Path ) – the toml file path YamlBaseModel Bases: BaseModel Extension of Pydantic BaseModel with YAML loader and dumper. from_yaml(yaml_file_path: Path) -> Self classmethod Create an instance of this YamlBaseModel from a YAML file. Parameters: yaml_file_path ( Path ) – the .yaml file path Returns: YamlBaseModel ( Self ) – An instance of this YamlBaseModel to_yaml(yaml_file_path: Path) -> None Write this YamlBaseModel to a file. Parameters: yaml_file_path ( Path ) – the .yaml file path
